dropdownUUIDs.Name: Provide drop-list in UUID fields
dropdownUUIDs.Hint: Adds a drop-down list showing all available UUIDs and a label showing their (nested) name of the relevant type (Region, Behavior, Macro, Scene) in UUID fields

onlyNavigatableScenes.Name: Only Navigatable Scenes
onlyNavigatableScenes.Hint: Only show UUIDs from Scenes for which navigation is enabled.

regionIcons.Name: Add Icons to Regions
regionIcons.Hint: Adds fields to a Region definition to specify an optional icon (with tint and size)

legendShowNoBehavior.Name: Highlight regions with no behaviors
legendShowNoBehavior.Hint: Changes the colour of the Config icon in the Region list when a region has no behaviors defined

autoLinkTeleport.Name: Auto-link Teleport Regions
autoLinkTeleport.Hint: Automatically link a Teleport behavior to a region with the complementary Region name

teleportPattern1.Name: Teleport Region Pattern Name 1
teleportPattern1.Hint: Specify the pattern of the region name for automatic teleport linking, of a pattern similar to '$1 up to $2' where $1 and $2 can be any text

teleportPattern2.Name: Teleport Region Pattern Name 2
teleportPattern2.Hint: Second pattern for the region name, in both cases '$1' should appear before '$2'

src.label: Icon Image
src.hint: Select an icon to display at the centre of each region polygon

size.label: Icon Size
size.validation: must be an integer greater than 32
